t=input()
for k in range(t):
    a=[]
    for i in range(10):
        a.append(sorted(map(int,raw_input().split())))
    m=[]
    for i in range(len(a)):
        m.append(a[i][14]-a[i][0])
    maxi=100000000
    index=0
    for i in range(len(m)):
        if m[i]<=maxi:
            maxi=m[i]
            index=i+1
    print index,maxi
